quantrecipes

Reference

Trend-based indicators

step_ma() tidy(<step_ma>)

Extract moving average features

Volatility-based indicators

step_bbands() bbands_thresholds() tidy(<step_bbands>)

Extract Bollinger Bands features

Backtest tools

step_cumret() tidy(<step_cumret>)

Calculate cumulative returns based on specified actions

Visualization tools

step_zigzag() tidy(<step_zigzag>)

Extract ZigZag features

Example Datasets

btcusdt

BTC/USDT historical data

actions

Example trading actions
